alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:21PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Coconino Counties just east of Tonto Village through 445 PM MST... At 419 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hunter Creek, or 11 miles west of Forest Lakes. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Haigler Creek, Christopher Creek, Tonto Village, Kohls Ranch, Spillway Campground, Ponderosa Campground, Sharp Creek Campground, Forest Road 195 Campground, Mogollon Campground, Forest Road 9350 Campground, Rim Campground, Christopher Creek Campground, Alderwood Campground, Woods Canyon Lake Campground and Sinkhole Campground. This includes State Route 260 between mile markers 265 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
